original_text: And I will fan them with a fan in the gates of the land; I will bereave them of children, I will destroy my people since they return not from their ways.
korean_text: 내가 그들을 그 땅의 여러 성문에서 키로 까불러 그 자식을 끊어서 내 백성을 멸하였나니 이는 그들이 자기들의 길에서 돌이키지 아니하였음이라

sentences.original_text: And I will fan them with a fan
in the gates of the land
I will bereave them of children
since they return not from their ways
